feature.label: Beanshell View
feature.description: Offers a Beanshell View that allows you to write scripts that manipulate data from the database. See the Quantum help for more info. Beanshell is a lightweight scripting language with a sintax very similar to Java. From the beanshell website (www.beanshell.org) : "BeanShell dynamically executes standard Java syntax and extends it with common scripting conveniences such as loose types, commands, and method closures like those in Perl and JavaScript."
